title: Quinn - GAME CHANGING Blinding Assault (Q) Bug

embed.description: The blind of the Quinn's Blinding Assault does not work as expected. I also think it's the same with Teemo's Blinding Dart (Q) but I'm not sure don't play this crap champ just a Teemo player told me.

replies.body:
Riot has literally never commented on anything relating to fixing Quinn that actually mattered...

Another Quinn thread that will sink to the bottom without anyone at Riot even reading it.

I mean how can we have all these glaringly obvious bugs on one champ and Riot isn't addressing them at all? Literally over half of her skills are bugged:

- Passive doesn't naturally proc unless you get closer than AA range
- Passive sometimes has 1-2 second delay before proc... even though Quinn is within range of a target and the cooldown is finished
- Blind doesn't blind the first attack from any monsters/minions
- Blind doesn't actually last 1.5 seconds
- Vault puts you out of AA range
- Vault sometimes bounces you in unpredictable directions
- AA is clunky and slow

> [{quoted}](name=Konidias,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=eqXEKJun,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2015-02-02T22:10:15.869+0000)
>
> Riot has literally never commented on anything relating to fixing Quinn that actually mattered...
> 
> Another Quinn thread that will sink to the bottom without anyone at Riot even reading it.
> 
> I mean how can we have all these glaringly obvious bugs on one champ and Riot isn't addressing them at all? Literally over half of her skills are bugged:
> 
> - Passive doesn't naturally proc unless you get closer than AA range
> - Passive sometimes has 1-2 second delay before proc... even though Quinn is within range of a target and the cooldown is finished
> - Blind doesn't blind the first attack from any monsters/minions
> - Blind doesn't actually last 1.5 seconds
> - Vault puts you out of AA range
> - Vault sometimes bounces you in unpredictable directions
> - AA is clunky and slow

you also forgot:
1. her harrier arrows disappear MID FLIGHT if you move during her auto attack animation even though the arrows have already fired
2. her vault puts you out of aa range of used from close range (edit) and only HALF the distance to aa range if used from long range
3. her ult is supposed to give you a ~.5 second invulnerability window while she switches out with valor (can be used to dodge Zed ult if timed right. used to do it all the time), but if you die before the switch for some reason it still burns your ult CD.
4. and i'm not 100% on this one but you can chain her passive, but if i remember correctly you cant have valor mark a target and use your vault to proc harrier on a different target without erasing the previous harrier mark.

 like i a said. not 100%. was a quinn adc main when i started but that's almost a year back and i dropped her sadly when i found all these bugs. waiting for a rework so i can use my woad scout again.
Number 2 was done on purpose. it would be a nerf if they changed it.

Yeah. I always like how its both an engage and a disengage in one ability :D

Just annoying how I have to walk back whenever I jump away from melee to poke back.

The autoattack animations look great, but need to be faster! (After maining Quinn, I literally cant last hit any minions with range anymore without her)
Yeah, how about they fix this along with Mundo's invisible cleavers that have been in the game for 2 patches.
and invisible nid spears
lol Thinking that's only been an issue for 2 patches.
I've been seeing invisible cleavers for a lot longer than 2 patches.
Please Riot fix this already, It's been too long. This is getting outrageous.

There's actually even more problems than just this.  I play Quinn A LOT and I've actually had her Q seemingly consumed by other abilities.

For instance: I was fighting a Trynd and he engaged on me.  I vaulted and did a bunch of damage and Qed (poor combo on my part but NOT THE POINT), as I Qed he used Spinning Slash to get away and my bird vanished the minute it hit his blade.  Did no damage, and he wasn't blind.  Rest assured though, it took the mana.

That's the most stark example I can think of but it's happened plenty of other times.

Quinn has a bunch of bugs, that if fixed she would probably become pretty popular.  In the meantime though... life gets rough sometimes.

> [{quoted}](name=SpottedDog,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=eqXEKJun,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-02-02T19:33:04.596+0000)
>
> Please Riot fix this already, It's been too long. This is getting outrageous.

Yeah, I think they supposedly did... unless that was just Teemo they fixed it on? Not gonna look for the patch notes.
idk but i saw this in my game once and stoped playing her, i was like "but... i blinded her... what the ????"
If this was a lee sin bug he would be disabled and hotfixed immediately

Cassio rework? You mean how she's actually being picked in the LCS now? Yeah, fuck that. Sure, it took a few patches to get her there but it's not like anyone played her before anyway(aside from the scripters, and fuck them).

> [{quoted}](name=Frikgeek,realm=EUNE,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=eqXEKJun,comment-id=000d,timestamp=2015-02-03T03:56:22.187+0000)
>
> Cassio rework? You mean how she's actually being picked in the LCS now? Yeah, fuck that. Sure, it took a few patches to get her there but it's not like anyone played her before anyway(aside from the scripters, and fuck them).

Cool story

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_pJolVJy82I
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=g_tED_RdaRQ
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=h_1AJBuTBhU

Oh look, it's Cassio in the LCS.
I'm almost 100% certain his reply meant "I don't give a shit about Cassio, this is a Quinn thread." So posting those videos really does nothing to prove your point.
Riot won't do anything about quinn, including giving her an actual identity

thats how all blinds work and this has been brought up too many times in the past i really dont think they will ever fix it

shit when i used to make threads about this people would just downvote it and say shit like "theres only two blinds in the game and one is on teemo who cares"

yeah sorry about that, its really sad to read some of those comments. without a positive feedback but maybe they are are just telling the truth, the ugly truth, and th's sad too. 
:(
Upvoting and commenting just to help it get noticed.

Some of the damage went through even on the registered blinded attacks (the second auto). seen at 0:21, his hp goes from 501 to 488 even though all the attacks register as "miss"
It's almost like riot's trying to remove blind from the game??? *CONSPIRACY THEORY TIME!
When they were finally considered blinded after the first auto hit, he did miss once of the chickens so that one hurt him the second time.
Teemo does have the same bug.

Teemo has this problem too.

100% sure it is blind itself being bugged.
If you use her Q and blind Fiora before her ult, Fiora's ult still does damage. Is this intended?

If I ever have to play ADC, Quinn is usually my first choice, and I've noticed this also quite a bit, so often that I never ever use her Q to actually blind anyone... simply for the damage and checking bushes.  What I mean is, the blind is so bugged, I don't even think it should be on the ability tooltip.

The Trynd example is the first thing I thought of.  When you Q a spinning Trynd, it DOES NOT BLIND HIM.  I have died from a Trynd more than once, from him slowing me, then spinning into melee range of me, and as he is spinning, I turn and Q him as his spin ends... EVEN WITH THE BLIND ICON OVER HIS HEAD, his very first autoattack out of the spin crits and kills me.

Another one Ive noticed is Yi.  But maybe this is supposed to happen.  Ive again, more than once been autoattacking a Yi, almost dead, I Q him, and the moment my Q hits, he also uses his Q.... which yes does the damage like its supposed to but since I'm alone his Q only jumps to me, and lasts a fraction of a second, he is not blinded when he comes out of it and ends up killing me on the next autoattack when he should be blinded.  Unless using his alpha strike is supposed to completely negate my blind and remove it.

Last one I've noticed is Jax when hes using his dodge.  His dodge is only supposed to ignore autoattacks, and lessens the damage of AOE attacks.... nothing about abilities status effects. A Jax running towards me, uses his E, jumps... I land my Q on him as he starts his jump.  He lands, jump does its damage, but so does his next autoattack which is empowered and hes blinded... Now I thought his empower was a basic attack modifier meaning IT SHOULD BE AFFECTED BY BLIND just like his passive third hit is affected by it.  NOPE, they both, while blinded, do their full damage.  

On a side note, even playing as Teemo, who has a working blind... I've noticed getting hit by someone who has a shiv while blinded still procs the shiv damage even when the autoattack misses...

Yeah I hate this glitch, really can chance how a game goes out when you are almost about to kill that Yi but than one auto attack takes 1/2 or 1/4 of your health even when you landed that blind{{champion:133}} {{item:3070}}
Noticed this about a year ago, too bad she isn't a popular champion or she would have all her bugs fixed the patch after they were reported but Quinn just gets ignored.

blind just work in weird ways. The first atk will land unless it is started after the blind is procced. The last auto that hits after the blind ends will miss. So my guess is that what happens here is that the damage hits first then the blind. However as soon as the damage lands the birds start their attack and the blind won't stop them because of the way blinds work. Best to just not try to blind people mid attack. it doesn't work.
